title: Rabbit Control [Part 1: Poisoning with 1080]
creator_credit: Ian Blythman, John Atkins and Conservation Forests and Lands
brief_description: This program narrated by Maurie Fields shows the problem of pest control in rural Victoria, and the adverse effects on farming if rabbit populations are not controlled. Part 1 explains the proper steps and procedure in using the poison 1080, the various safety precautions, equipment and supplies and tidy up details.
